name: OpenAI Text-to-Speech
description: This tool converts text into high-quality spoken audio using OpenAI's Text-to-Speech (TTS) API. It allows users to customize the output by selecting from a variety of voices, choosing a TTS model (including tts-1, tts-1-hd, and gpt-4o-mini-tts), and adjusting the speech speed. For the gpt-4o-mini-tts model, users can provide specific instructions to control elements like emotion, accent, and tone. The final audio is saved in a user-selected format (e.g., MP3, WAV, FLAC) and the file path is returned.
author: @@official.shinkai

api_key.description: API key for authorization to OpenAI TTS API

default_audio_format.description: Default audio format output if not specified in inputs

default_model.description: Default TTS model to use if not specified in inputs

default_speed.description: Default speed of generated audio if not specified in inputs

text.description: The text to convert to speech

voice.description: Voice selection for speech synthesis. Possible values: alloy, ash, ballad, coral, echo, fable, nova, onyx (default), sage, shimmer

speed.description: Speed of generated audio between 0.25 and 4.0. Default is config default_speed or 1.0

audio_format.description: Audio format output. Supported formats: mp3, opus, aac, flac, wav, pcm. Defaults to config default_audio_format or 'mp3'

instructions.description: Optional instructions to control speech aspects such as accent, emotional range, intonation, impressions, speed, tone, whispering, etc.

model.description: TTS model to use. Allowed values: tts-1, tts-1-hd, gpt-4o-mini-tts. Defaults to config default_model or 'gpt-4o-mini-tts'

audio_file_path.description: The file path where the generated speech audio is saved
